snippet.title: Alternative Brackets: The 'Fruits and Vegetables' tournament preview
snippet.description:

If you fill out a bracket for our Fruits and Vegetables tourney, you'll be entered into a random draft to win a prize package that includes a PlayStation 4, and more importantly, a banana suit. It...

snippet.title: FCS Championship: Maryland, North Dakota governors engage in adorable, low-stakes bet
snippet.description:
FCS Championship: Maryland, North Dakota governors engage in adorable, low-stakes bet by Pete Volk on Jan 3 2014, 9:41a
Towson and North Dakota State will square off in the FCS Championship Game.

snippet.title: Breaking Madden: The glorious return of Tecmo Bo Jackson
snippet.description:
Breaking Madden: The glorious return of Tecmo Bo Jackson by Jon Bois on Nov 21 2013, 1:30p
The legend of Bo Jackson extended to video games. His Tecmo Bowl self remains arguably the greatest athlete in the history of gaming. In this episode, we recreate Bo in Madden NFL 25, and watch him...

snippet.title: College football moms: The year in review
snippet.description:
College football moms: The year in review by Patrick Vint on May 12 2013, 12:18p
What a year for moms in college football! Happy Mothers' Day, everyone.

snippet.title: Gnawlins: Sazeracs, hurricanes, and gator po-boys
snippet.description:
Gnawlins: Sazeracs, hurricanes, and gator po-boys by Matt Ufford on Feb 2 2013, 10:18p
How drunk can you get in one day in New Orleans? Pretty drunk, actually.

snippet.title: The Fun In Funeral: 2011 College Football's Dark New Orleans Sendoff
snippet.description:
The Fun In Funeral: 2011 College Football's Dark New Orleans Sendoff by Spencer Hall on Jan 10 2012, 9:41a
Spencer Hall attends a funeral in New Orleans, the only possible final resting place for the 2011 college football season.

snippet.title: The College Football Alphabetical, Week 6: The Donkeys Start To Fall
snippet.description:
The College Football Alphabetical, Week 6: The Donkeys Start To Fall by Spencer Hall on Oct 10 2011, 2:49p
This week's Alphabetical ponders the quality of your team-donkey, details the disorder at Ohio State, and isn't questioning the sorcery happening at Clemson.

snippet.title: Strikeforce Exclusive: Brett Rogers Is Done With 'Amateur Time'
snippet.description:
Strikeforce Exclusive: Brett Rogers Is Done With 'Amateur Time' by Luke Thomas on Jun 17 2011, 11:51a
It's cliche and hackneyed because it's overused. Alas, it's also still true: a fighter often learns more from a loss than a win. A loss, when the lessons are properly absorbed, forces the fighter...

snippet.title: The Least Watchable College Football Teams In Recent Memory: A Loathing Compendium
snippet.description:
The Least Watchable College Football Teams In Recent Memory: A Loathing Compendium by Spencer Hall on Aug 2 2011, 3:10p
Some teams are bad. Some teams are unwatchable. But when they're both bad and unwatchable, you get Spencer Hall's collection of the six teams best forgotten for all time.

snippet.title: Tales From The Tuba Section: The Epic Oral History Of Your College Marching Band
snippet.description:
Tales From The Tuba Section: The Epic Oral History Of Your College Marching Band by Spencer Hall on Apr 12 2011, 1:14p
They travel hundreds of miles on creaky buses wearing hot, scratchy wool uniforms, all in the name of entertainment. Marching band members are the unsung heroes of college sporting events, and they...
